Experience Director, Security & IT Compliance, Nordic IT Santander Consumer Bank AS May 2015  – Present (4 months) Copenhagen Area, Capital Region, Denmark Responsible for the Security and IT Compliance in Santander Consumer Bank in the Nordic countries (Denmark, Norway, Sweden and Finland).  
Responsibilities include, but are not limited to, people management, defining and maintaining security related policies, processes and standards, Security Management Tools, Business Continuity Management (BCM) & Disaster/Recovery, IT Risk Management, IT Compliance, Management Reporting and Continous Security Awarenes Training. Nordic IT Risk Manager Santander Consumer Bank AB November 2014  –  April 2015  (6 months) Copenhagen Area, Denmark Nordic IT Risk Manager, responsible for securing Santander Consumer Bank AB's risk appetite decision making in the Nordic IT Governance Board. The Nordic IT Risk Manager owns the Nordic IT Risk process and drives IT Risk activities. The Nordic IT Risk Manager coordinates with Nordic Operational Risk team and process in order to enable overarching risk awareness. 
Also, acting local IT-Controller for Denmark IT Risk Manager (Nordics) GE Money Bank AB September 2013  –  November 2014  (1 year 3 months) Copenhagen Area, Denmark IT Risk Manager (Nordics) responsible for securing GE Money Bank risk appetite decision making in the Nordic IT Governance Board. The IT Risk Manager owns the Nordic Risk process and coordinates EMEA HQ and GECC HQ IT risk activities. The IT Risk Manager coordinates with Nordic OP Risk team and process in order to enable overarching risk awareness. 
Also, acting local IT-Controller for Denmark Risk Manager IBM Danmark March 2011  –  August 2013  (2 years 6 months) Prøvensvej 1, 2605 Brøndby, Denmark As Risk Manager for the Danske Bank account, a large Danish financial IBM client, I was responsible for the following: 
- Formulation and effective maintenance of Risk Management policy and organizational implementation at respective level and education of potential Risk Identifiers. 
- Documentation of Risks in a Risk Log 
- Preparing regular Risk status reports 
- Monitoring Risks 
- Escalation if Risks requires immediate attention 
- Analyze Risk Management data 
- Taking the lead in preparing and managing Risk Mitigation Plans 
- Logging and tracking 
- Monitoring changes in the probability and/or impact of identified Risks 
- Risk Manager is chair and call for Risk Review Board meetings at respective level when needed. As a Test Architect I created a test approach based on combinatorial test design (CTD) and statistical analysis and comparison. CTD allowed me to minimze my testcases while keeping the maximum coverage for my tests. The statistical techniques were implemented to have an automated approach using a small framework that was easily expandable. First the incoming data was anaylzed for field correctness and then computed to give the statistical descriptions. Then the data was loaded in the datawarehouse were again, the statistical descriptions were calculated. finally the incoming dataset was compared to what was found in the datawarehouse to figure out any discrepancies.

Summary Has got close to around 18 yrs of rich work experience in IT & Recruitment Industry. His strong recruitment skills and an eye for detail, has helped many companies in their hiring and staffing needs. Has worked with large system integrator s companies, like Cognizant, IBM, Accenture, Infosys, Satyam, NTT Data, Dun & Brad Street, Merrill Lynch etc., to name a few and has serviced them at a national level.

(PCK Ltd.)/ DATACROSS® was created in 2009. DATACROSS® sites started as greenfield investments and are the first of this kind in Croatia or its surrounding region. An investment that ensures both domestic and regional organizations have available efficient and effective co-location services based on not only local, but regional standards. Our financially feasible service offering includes experts in engineering, energetics and IT support. In 2011. PCK signed the agreement on strategic investment with domestic equity/venture capital fund Nexus FGS (http://www.nexus-pe.hr/en/) and made preconditions for the implementation of the first Data Center location at Jastrebarsko for early 2012. DATACROSS® Jastrebarsko was officially opened on 11/30/2012 in the Business Park Jalševac, only 35 kilometers from Zagreb, Croatia, which place Croatia on the map of few states with high-quality Data Centers that enable Companies and Institutions to store and protect data on high-quality and safe place in accordance with international standards. DATACROSS ® is a leader of technological development in the provision of specialized services and a standardized data center whose fundamental objective is to create new value for our customers. Our desire is to not only build and maintain high-performance and secure data centers, but also help in the management of ICT processes. We are continually achieving business efficiency, quality, rapid development and increased profitability. 
DATACROSS ® Jastrebarsko is the first multifunctional center of high technology, which are designed and built to the highest international industry standards of safety, quality & reliability. Data center is intended for a wide range of users - from secure storage and data processing for large, institutional customers and public institutions to small businesses such as outsourcing of IT services.
